<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Addictions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neigungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Penchants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Addictions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggiunte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθισμοί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Apegos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">How to present a topic in English as a second language. The page has step by step commands on how to present the topic of addictions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">addictions</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man ein Thema auf englisch als zweite Sprache
darstellt. Die Seite hat schrittweisee Befehle auf, wie man das 
Thema von Neigungen darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment présenter un sujet en anglais comme 
deuxième langage. La page a des commandes pas à pas sur la 
façon dont présenter le sujet des penchants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como apresentar um tópico em inglês como uma 
segunda língua. A página tem a etapa por comandos da etapa em 
como apresentar o tópico dos addictions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come presentare un soggetto in inglese come 
secondo linguaggio. La pagina ha comandi graduali su come 
presentare il soggetto delle aggiunte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να παρουσιάσει ένα θέμα στα αγγλικά ως δεύτερη 
γλώσσα. Η σελίδα έχει τις βαθμιαίες εντολές στο πώς να 
παρουσιάσει το θέμα των εθισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo presentar un asunto en inglés como segundo
lenguaje. La paginación tiene comandos paso a paso en cómo 
presentar el asunto de apegos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neigungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">penchants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">addictions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aggiunte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εθισμοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">apegos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

version:3.0

        <educational>

          <typicalAgeRange>

          <context>

        <classification>

          <taxonPath>
